mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (name, age, birthday, create_time, update_time) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, age, birthday, create_time, update_time from user
